item.title: A 25-Step TDD Kata: Building a Markdown Renderer in Rust
item.description: Sharpen your Rust and TDD skills with this extensive 25-step coding challenge. Build a complete Markdown-to-HTML renderer from scratch, one test at a time. Perfect for deliberate practice.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
